Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.10-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.10-4. A patched version of the package is available.
